feed.title: Bitcoin URI for multiple addresses without using URLs

entry.title: Bitcoin URI for multiple addresses without using URLs
entry.summary: A user is seeking advice from bitcoin-dev on whether it is possible to send their wallet a URI with all the necessary information to make donations to multiple addresses at once instead of using BIP71, which requires including a URL for the wallet to access the information. The user is looking to simplify the process and is requesting guidance on whether this idea is feasible within the context of BIPs.
